traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The armanite has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The armanite's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The armanite makes three attacks: one with its hooves, one with its claws, and one with its serrated tail.

actions.name: Hooves
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d4 + 5 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Serrated Tail
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Lance {@recharge 5}
entries: The armanite looses a bolt of lightning in a line 60 feet long and 10 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8 damage) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
